name: Facebook Above the Clouds by Sangeet Khatri
description: An very beautiful theme which makes you feel like you are sitting above the clouds. I love this one. My fav for now, and also my daily driver for Facebook. I made it for myself, but if it does not fit your taste or you do not like the transparency or other stuff then contact me at http://www.facebook.com/sangeet.khatri and i would love to help you out.

discussions.name: Facebook Above the Clouds by Sangeet Khatri
